name: old-charm
effect: Given to Cynthia’s grandmother to get the Surf HM.
short_effect: Trade to Cynthia’s grandmother in Celestic Town for HM04 (Surf).

flavor_text.black-white: An ancient good-luck charm made of Pokémon bones to be taken to the elder of Celestic Town.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: An ancient good-luck charm made of Pokémon bones to be taken to the elder of Celestic Town.
